resources.string: Give as many words as you can think of from the letter "A". Tap the microphone below to speak.
Make sure you don\'t use proper nouns , numbers and different forms of a verb.
Press on the mic to speak
Look for 6 Hidden Words in the picture below
Now, choose these 6 words from the options below
You might not have Alzheimer\'s Disease
Welcome to Alzheimers Detection Game. . . Necessary instructions will be recited to you before the starting of each stage,follow those instructions to ace the stage
Welcome to Stage 1 . . . Memory. . . Listen to the story of the caterpillar carefully and then answer the questions accordingly. .
Welcome to stage 2. . . Attention . . .You will hear a series of alphabets. . .tap on the screen, everytime the alphabet. . . A is heard. . .please tap to proceed further
Welcome to stage 3 . . . Calculation . . .You will be asked 3 questions,calculate mentally and speak out the larger value . . . please tap to proceed further

You are now on stage 4. . . Sentence repetition . . . sentences will be recited to you two times . . . recall and record these sentences. . . in exactly the same manner . . . tap to listen to the first sentence
Hello again . . . you are now on stage 5 . . . Verbal fluency . . . let\'s have a fun activity . . . record as many words as possible . . . from the given alphabet . . . Tap to proceed further

Welcome to stage 6 Abstraction Let\'s check for similarities between objects . ..you will be required to swipe the screen according to the instructions which you will hear shortly. . . Tap to proceed further
This is stage 7 . . . Delayed recall . . . Recall the story you heard about the Caterpillars Adventures . . answer a few more questions now. . . Tap to proceed further

Welcome to stage 8 . . . orientation, the last stage of the game...In this stage, The Alzheimerâ€™s Detection Pvt. Ltd. are hiring full time employees. You are one of the aspiring job seekers , you land a telephonic interview chance with them. You will be asked 6 simple questions , give one word answers for them and increase your chances to get shortlisted.. . .Tap to proceed further
Give as many words as you can think of from the letter "A".. Press on the screen to speak
Make sure you don\'t use proper nouns , numbers and different forms of a verb.
My parents and I went to a movie.
The paper and pencil sat idle on the desk.
He wanted to bring peace to his kingdom.

string-array.name: DRQuetion
string-array.item: Who did the Caterpillar not ask for help ?
What are Crabs shoes used for?
Fill in the blank. The Frogs shoe is dash for the Caterpillar.
What does the caterpillar decide to do at the end ?
What was the sequence in which caterpillar met her friends?

string-array.name: IRQuetions
string-array.item: What was the sequence in which caterpillar met her friends?
What does the caterpillar decide to do at the end ?

string-array.name: Abstraction_que
string-array.item: How Train and bus Are alike?
How Dog and Cat Are alike?

string-array.name: Abstraction_Option1
string-array.item: Both can move on their own

string-array.name: Calculation_que
string-array.item: A burger of 250 calories with pizza of 500 calories or a plate of veggies of 250 calories. Which will have less calories?
1 bottle of 1000 ml cold drink or 3 bottles of 250 ml each. Which is a greater quantity?

resources.string: Welcome to Alzheimer\'s Detection private limited... Let\'s start with your interview
Which day of the Month is Today ?
What month is it , right now ?
Which day of the week is Today ?
Which city are you in right now ?
